name: Snail Bail
description:
You are a cool, rigid piece of lettuce, cursed by your own flavour. No matter what you do, this snail won't leave you alone! Ditch that square by running and jumping off the goo it leaves behind. Controls: WAD , arrow keys or controller
R to restart the Level
Esc or P to pause Game Mechanics Explained: •You are a Lettuce
•You can Run and Jump, as well as Walljump
•The Snail chasing you does exactly the same things you did •The Snail has a solid Trail that you can use as a platform
•You and the Snail can temporarily disable Lasers by stepping on Buttons
•The Snail's trail can block lasers Credits: •Programming:       Ben Nielsen
•Music & SFX:        Alex Milevic
•Pixel Art:            de_g0od [https://de-g0od.itch.io/]
